targets.query: SELECT last("p_pv_1")  FROM "autogen"."inputs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("p_pv_2")  FROM "autogen"."inputs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("p_pv_1") + last("p_pv_2")  FROM "autogen"."inputs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("p_inv") - mean("p_rec") + mean("p_to_user") - mean("p_to_grid") FROM "autogen"."inputs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
select last("p_to_user") - last("p_to_grid") from "autogen"."inputs"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
